message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEM_FV_VERIFICATION_ITEM_CANCELLED
message.locale: This verification item has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEM_FV_NAME_EXISTS
message.locale: A Verification Item with the name specified already exists. Please enter a new Name.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEM_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: A Verification Item Name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEM_XRV_ASSOCIATED_VERIFICATION_ITEM_UTILIZATION_EXISTS
message.locale: This verification item cannot be deleted as it has associated verification item utilization.
This verification item cannot be deleted as it has associated verification item utilisation.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEM_XRV_ASSOCIATED_VERIFICATION_GROUP_EXISTS
message.locale: This verification item cannot be deleted as it has associated verification group.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONITEM_XRV_DIFFERENT_USAGE_TYPE
message.locale: Usage Type cannot be different for the same verification item %1s
